content: {"locationId": "1709", "organizationId": "1556", "name": "Salvation Army Marion", "address1": "906 Tower Square", "address2": "", "city": "Marion", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "62959", "country": null, "phone": "618-993-5854", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "37.7302825", "longitude": "-88.9269434", "foodPrograms": "Food Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "The Food Pantry Serves all of Williamson and Johnson Counties.  Emergency Food is available to anyone in need that is not a regular client.  Photo ID and proof of address are required at the first visit - subsequent visits only require a Photo ID.  Emergency Food does not require and Identification.     We serve all those who have income below DHS guidelines, without discrimination.  We offer curbside check-in and are able to assist those with difficulties walking by providing services at their vehicle.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "618-993-5854", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Wednesday 9:00 AM-11:30 AM", "Friday 9:00 AM-11:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
